entity.name: Religions
entity.entry:
For the most part I don't want the deities to be too complicated. I find "Forgotten Realms" overly complex and un-relatable and prefer to draw inspiration from the pantheons of Earth. With that in mind, I offer the following:

  • [note:6861797] - Greek Mythos
  • [note:6861837] - Norse Mythos
  • Humans - [note:6861865|Gods of the Empire ] for citizens for the empire or The [note:6862012|Old Gods] who are worshiped by those who were conquered
  • Other Races - Some mix of the above, or we can get creative, particularly if you want to run a cleric or paladin.
